items.title: Meet the March Madness millionaires: From Duke’s Cooper Flagg to Purdue’s Braden Smith, college athletes are raking in eight-figure NIL deals
items.description: Through NIL deals, college athletes can earn their own money from using their image.

items.title: Nissan’s next CEO says it needs partners and he’s open to Honda
items.description: “A CEO is normally dealing with one or two major crises in his or her career. I’m gonna have to deal with four or five at the same time."

items.title: Months after calling Wizz Air’s unlimited flights deal a ‘marketing scam’, Michael O’Leary’s Ryanair launches its own subscription service
items.description: Michael O'Leary mocked Wizz Air's "All You Can Fly" deal as a marketing stunt. Now he's letting Ryanair passengers spend £79 on a "Prime" deal.
